objects.text: • IR Reflection Technology • Eco-friendly Formula • Energy-saving

product_details.name: Panache Cool Top Eco - Advanced Heat Reflective Roof Coating | 5KG
product_details.description:
• IR Reflection Technology for superior heat reduction
• Eco-friendly nano-technology formulation
• High SRI (Solar Reflective Index) rating for maximum cooling efficiency
• Easy roof application and coverage
• 5KG bucket size for extensive coverage
• Professional-grade cooling solution
• Weather-resistant and durable coating
• Reduces indoor temperature naturally
• Energy-saving solution for buildings
• Compatible with various roof surfaces
• Environment-friendly cooling solution
• Long-lasting thermal protection

banner_details:
The banner showcases a heat-reflective coating product in a professional and clean layout. A prominent product image is centered within a soft radial backdrop circle, emphasizing the item. The "heading" text is bold and eye-catching, supported by a smaller "subheading" describing the product benefits. A contrasting price badge ("price") overlays the product image within a deep green circular shape. Three key features are listed below in "description" using bullet points for better readability. At the bottom, a call-to-action button with "cta_background" and "cta" text directs user engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Aqua: #E0F7FA
- Teal Gradient: #009688 → #00796B
- Deep Green: #004D40
- Emerald Green: #00796B
- White: #FFFFFF
- Aqua Shadow: #4DB6AC
product_color: The product image uses a clean and modern color palette dominated by teal green (#009187) that exudes a sense of freshness, eco-friendliness, and innovation. White (#FFFFFF) is creatively used as a background and text color to enhance readability and contrast. The brand name "Panache" is in a deep navy blue (#1C2A5B), conveying trust and professionalism. Additionally, a striking lime green (#B3D334) in the leaf element adds an eco-conscious touch. The colors are well-blended with clear boundaries, maintaining visual clarity while drawing attention to key elements like the product name and usage. The design balances vibrancy with simplicity effectively.
